text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Wonderful! I've heard good news of your numerous victories!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Brilliant! The light glistening from these trophies is endless!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: You're an especially rare specimen. I'm not sure there has ever been a better trainer.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm, better yet! There will never be another like you either!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Dare to hope! My dream might just come true. Keep up the great work!
